query.name: command-user-list
query.comment: Get the list of users with login sessions
query.sql: SELECT u.id AS id, u.name AS name, email.email AS email, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM awa_acl AS acl WHERE u.id = acl.user_id) AS acl_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM awa_session AS session WHERE session.user_id = u.id AND session.stype = 1) AS auth_count, (SELECT MAX(session.start_date) FROM awa_session AS session WHERE session.user_id = u.id AND session.stype = 1) AS last_login FROM awa_user AS u LEFT JOIN awa_email AS email ON u.email_id = email.id
query.sql-count: SELECT count(u.id) FROM awa_user AS u
